job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: As an&nbsp;Senior Software Engineer - OnLink&nbsp;for&nbsp;John Deere's&nbsp;Intelligent Solutions Group (ISG)&nbsp;you will be the technical Leader for the development of the&nbsp;OnLink&nbsp;product that enables golf course professionals to plan, monitor, and complete the work to maintain the golf course and their business operations.&nbsp;Our Staff Engineers are technical leaders – designing and developing production software, championing software development practices and mentoring/coaching the team members on industry trends.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;An ideal candidate will be someone with a passion for being in the code and a demonstrated history of technical leadership in delivering global software products.   Here is a link to learn more about the OnLink application - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c2RDLV-5y1s
